0.text: Innate: Whenever Cho'Gath kills an enemy, it  heals for 18 − 52 (based on level) and restores  3.5 − 7.75 (based on level) mana.

Active: Cho'Gath ruptures the target location after a 0.627 seconds-second delay, granting  sight of the area before dealing magic damage and  knocking up enemies within for 1 second, and afterwards  slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.
Active: Cho'Gath roars in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone.

1.text: Enemy  champions and  Rift Scuttlers hit are also  silenced for a duration.

0.text: Active: Cho'Gath's next 3 basic attacks on-attack within 6 seconds gain  50 bonus range and launch a blast of spikes in the direction of the target, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and applying a  slow that decays over 1.5 seconds. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 60 against  minions and  monsters.

0.content: 22 / 34 / 46 / 58 / 70 (+ 30% AP) (+ 3% (+ 0.5% per  Feast stack) of target's maximum health)

1.content: 66 / 102 / 138 / 174 / 210 (+ 90% AP) (+ 9% (+ 1.5% per  Feast stack) of target's maximum health)

1.text: Vorpal Spikes  resets Cho'Gath's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Cho'Gath attempts to eat the target enemy, dealing them  true damage. Against non-champions, the base damage is modified to 1000.

1.text: If the target is killed, Cho'Gath gains a Feast stack. Only 6 stacks can be gained from non-epic  monsters or  minions.

2.text: Each stack of Feast grants Cho'Gath  bonus health as well as  bonus attack range and increased size, capping at  75 bonus attack range and 100% increased size.
